# results

**Instance Property**

The collection of observation results generated by request processing.

## Declaration

```swift
var results: [VNObservation]? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the request fails, this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/nil-227m0]. Otherwise, it contains an array of [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNObservation] subclasses specific to the [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNRequest] subclass.

Don’t access this property until the request has finished processing.

## Configuring a Request

- **VNRequestCompletionHandler**: A type alias to encapsulate the syntax for the completion handler the system calls after the request finishes processing.
- **completionHandler**: The completion handler the system invokes after the request finishes processing.
- **preferBackgroundProcessing**: A hint to minimize the resource burden of the request.
- **revision**: The specific algorithm or implementation revision that’s used to perform the request.
- **usesCPUOnly**: A Boolean signifying that the Vision request should execute exclusively on the CPU.
